original_text: After the prophet Hananiah had broken the yoke off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah, the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah:
korean_text: 선지자 하나냐가 선지자 예레미야의 목에서 멍에를 꺾어 버린 후에 여호와의 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라 이르시기를

sentences.original_text: After the prophet Hananiah had broken the yoke
off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah
the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah
